text: Mulla Makhan railway station (, Sindh: مُلان مکڻ ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Taluka Hala, District Matiari, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Sindh
title: Mulla Makhan railway station
